      • copyLength

        public static String[] copyLength(int size,
                  char e,
                  StringsUtils.POSITION p,
                  String... strs)
        Sets the same length into multiple Strings by using a Char.

        So far, this is a bit useless because letters in Minecraft does not occupy the same space

        Parameters:
        size - Maximum size
        e - Char to add
        p - Position in the 'block'
        strs - String...
        Returns:
        String[] in the same order
        Since:
        0.0.9
